8.name: Processing of structured information
8.desc: The information to be processed is in structured form.

9.name: Processing of identical information in structured and unstructured form
9.desc: The information to be processed is identical and given in structured and unstructured form.

10.name: Processing of different information in structured and unstructured form
10.desc: The information to be processed is different and is given in structured and unstructured form.

11.name: Processing of unstructured information
11.desc: The information to be processed is in unstructured form.
